00039 /*
00040  * Dumps the memory stats of the dll to the Debug console and puts the API
00041  * in an undefined state. NEVER CALL ANY OTHER BEAST API FUNCTIONS AFTER THIS!
00042  * Only works on debug builds, this means that it CAN only be used
00043  * internally for now. 
00044  * @returns ILB_ST_SUCCESS if there are no leaks or it's called running 
00045  * from a Release build
00046  * @todo Should we hide this function?
00047  */
00048 ILB_DLL_FUNCTION ILBStatus ILBDumpMemoryStats();
